variant.p: After initial recognition, an entity that chooses the cost model shall measure investment property:

li.p: in accordance with IFRS 5 Non-current Assets Held for Sale and Discontinued Operations if it meets the criteria to be classified as held for sale (or is included in a disposal group that is classified as held for sale);
in accordance with IFRS 16 if it is held by a lessee as a right-of-use asset and is not held for sale in accordance with IFRS 5; and
in accordance with the requirements in IAS 16 for the cost model in all other cases.
